name: Marvel Superheroes! Quiz | Marvel Comics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Spiderman's Clone.

	The Jackal made clones of Spiderman, most of them were disfigured in some way, but Ben Reilly was almost a perfect clone. Peter is convinced that Ben is the real Spiderman, and that he himself is a clone, so he lets Ben take over the mantle of Spiderman.

questions.text: Which of these heroes is the oldest in age?
questions.explanation:
Wolverine.

	Wolverine has lived for a very long time, more than 60 years at least. His memories have been tampered with so there is no way to know for sure.  His healing factor helped keep him alive for so long.

Rick Jones.

	Rick Jones gained his powers through gamma radiation. Like the Hulk, he can transform into a huge creature if agitated.

questions.text: In the graphic novel "Old Man Logan", which one of the heroes has gone blind?
questions.explanation:
Hawkeye.

	Hawkeye may have become blind, but he can still locate enemies by the sounds they make.

War Machine.

	James Rhodes uses one of Iron Man's suits to become War Machine.  Tony lets James use the suit, and even lets James fill in for him when Tony is on a long leave of absence.

Lucifer.

	Professor X stopped the alien Lucifer from conquering the world. Lucifer repaid him by dropping a giant stone on his back, crushing his legs.

questions.text: Which hero becomes the deadly Phoenix?
questions.explanation:
Jean Grey.

	The Phoenix is a dark presence that lives inside Jean. If she lets her emotions get out of control it takes her over.

questions.text: Which member of the X-Men can walk through walls?
questions.explanation:
Kitty Pryde.

	Kitty Pryde, AKA Shadowcat, has the ability to phase through anything, even people.

Ms. Marvel

	Carol Danvers became Ms. Marvel after an alien device blew up, giving her unique powers. Rogue permanently absorbed some of Ms. Marvels power.

questions.text: Spiderman dons a new suit that enhances his Spider Sense in which comic book series?
questions.explanation:
Civil War.

	Tony Stark makes Spiderman a new suit, the suit enhances all of Peter's abilities. Peter ditches the suit after he leaves the Pro-Registration forces. Stark planted a failsafe in the costume, but Peter learned about it and removed it.
